Interface R2MaterialOpaqueBatchedType<M>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - The type of shader parameters
    All Superinterfaces:

    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2MaterialOpaqueBatched

    public interface R2MaterialOpaqueBatchedType<M>
extends R2MaterialType<M>
    The type of opaque materials that can be applied to batched instances.
